name: Asteroid Anarchy
description:
An asteroid is hurtling towards the Earth! A group of anarchists put a thruster on the asteroid to destroy the planet. It is your job to destroy the energy cores powering the thrusters. If you destroy all 5 of them, it will slow the asteroid down long enough for the people on Earth to escape.

Use WASD or arrow keys to control your ship.

Hold space to shoot.

This is my second Ludum Dare! I really hope you all enjoy.

Thanks to Common for doing all the 3d modeling.
